Sqls.Select: SELECT ZCID, ZCFL, SUM(ZCYZ) AS ZCYZ, SUM(ZCLJZJ) AS ZCLJZJ, SUM(ZCYZJ) AS ZCYZJ FROM ( SELECT SUBSTR(ZCID,1,1) AS ZCID, SUBSTR(ZCFL, 1, 3) AS ZCFL, SUM(ZCYZ) AS ZCYZ, SUM(ZCLJZJ) AS ZCLJZJ, SUM(ZCYZJ) AS ZCYZJ FROM #SMG.GDZC WHERE ZCSTAT IN ('1', '8') AND ZCZJZ=0 AND SUBSTR(ZCFL,1,3) IN ('GY0', 'GY1', '4G6', 'A91', 'A92', '4KH') GROUP BY SUBSTR(ZCID,1,1), SUBSTR(ZCFL, 1, 3) UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ZCID,1,1)||'1' AS ZCID, SUBSTR(ZCFL, 1, 3) AS ZCFL, SUM(ZCYZ - ZCZJZZ) AS ZCYZ, SUM(ZCLJZJ) AS ZCLJZJ, SUM(ZCYZJ) AS ZCYZJ FROM #SMG.GDZC WHERE ((ZCSTAT IN ('1', '8') AND ZCZJZ=1) OR ZCSTAT IN ('30')) AND SUBSTR(ZCFL,1,3) IN ('GY0', 'GY1', '4G6', 'A91', 'A92', '4KH') GROUP BY SUBSTR(ZCID,1,1)||'1', SUBSTR(ZCFL, 1, 3) UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ZCID,1,1) AS ZCID, 'FSCGLF' AS ZCFL, SUM(ZCYZ) AS ZCYZ, SUM(ZCLJZJ) AS ZCLJZJ, SUM(ZCYZJ) AS ZCYZJ FROM #SMG.GDZC WHERE ZCSTAT IN ('1', '8') AND ZCZJZ=0 AND SUBSTR(ZCFL,1,3) IN ('FSA', 'FSC') AND SUBSTR(ZCFL,1,6) NOT IN ('FSCFLF', 'FSCYFF') GROUP BY SUBSTR(ZCID,1,1) UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ZCID,1,1)||'1' AS ZCID, 'FSCGLF' AS ZCFL, SUM(ZCYZ - ZCZJZZ) AS ZCYZ, SUM(ZCLJZJ) AS ZCLJZJ, SUM(ZCYZJ) AS ZCYZJ FROM #SMG.GDZC WHERE ((ZCSTAT IN ('1', '8') AND ZCZJZ=1) OR ZCSTAT IN ('30')) AND SUBSTR(ZCFL,1,3) IN ('FSA', 'FSC') AND SUBSTR(ZCFL,1,6) NOT IN ('FSCFLF', 'FSCYFF') GROUP BY SUBSTR(ZCID,1,1)||'1' UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ZCID,1,1) AS ZCID, SUBSTR(ZCFL, 1, 6) AS ZCFL, SUM(ZCYZ) AS ZCYZ, SUM(ZCLJZJ) AS ZCLJZJ, SUM(ZCYZJ) AS ZCYZJ FROM #SMG.GDZC WHERE ZCSTAT IN ('1', '8') AND ZCZJZ=0 AND SUBSTR(ZCFL,1,6) IN ('FSCFLF', 'FSCYFF') GROUP BY SUBSTR(ZCID,1,1), SUBSTR(ZCFL, 1, 6) UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ZCID,1,1)||'1' AS ZCID, SUBSTR(ZCFL, 1, 6) AS ZCFL, SUM(ZCYZ - ZCZJZZ) AS ZCYZ, SUM(ZCLJZJ) AS ZCLJZJ, SUM(ZCYZJ) AS ZCYZJ FROM #SMG.GDZC WHERE ((ZCSTAT IN ('1', '8') AND ZCZJZ=1) OR ZCSTAT IN ('30')) AND SUBSTR(ZCFL,1,6) IN ('FSCFLF', 'FSCYFF') GROUP BY SUBSTR(ZCID,1,1)||'1', SUBSTR(ZCFL, 1, 6) ) AS A GROUP BY ZCID, ZCFL ORDER BY ZCID, ZCFL
